    • 构造器详细资料

      • MiniCluster

        public MiniCluster(MiniClusterConfiguration miniClusterConfiguration)
        Creates a new Flink mini cluster based on the given configuration.
        参数:
        miniClusterConfiguration - The configuration for the mini cluster

    • 方法详细资料

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Checks if the mini cluster was started and is running.

      • start

        public void start()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Starts the mini cluster, based on the configured properties.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - This method passes on any exception that occurs during the startup of the mini cluster.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Shuts down the mini cluster, failing all currently executing jobs. The mini cluster can be started again by calling the start() method again.

        This method shuts down all started services and components, even if an exception occurs in the process of shutting down some component.

        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the shutdown did not complete cleanly.

      • shutdownInternally

        private void shutdownInternally()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • waitUntilTaskManagerRegistrationsComplete

        public void waitUntilTaskManagerRegistrationsComplete()
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • runDetached

        public void runDetached(JobGraph job)
                 throws JobExecutionException
        This method executes a job in detached mode. The method returns immediately after the job has been added to the
        参数:
        job - The Flink job to execute
        抛出:
        JobExecutionException - Thrown if anything went amiss during initial job launch, or if the job terminally failed.

      • runJobBlocking

        public JobExecutionResult runJobBlocking(JobGraph job)
                                  throws JobExecutionException,
                                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method runs a job in blocking mode. The method returns only after the job completed successfully, or after it failed terminally.
        参数:
        job - The Flink job to execute
        返回:
        The result of the job execution
        抛出:
        JobExecutionException - Thrown if anything went amiss during initial job launch, or if the job terminally failed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • createMetricRegistry

        protected MetricRegistryImpl createMetricRegistry(Configuration config)
        Factory method to create the metric registry for the mini cluster
        参数:
        config - The configuration of the mini cluster

      • createRpcService

        protected RpcService createRpcService(Configuration configuration,
                                      Time askTimeout,
                                      boolean remoteEnabled,
                                      java.lang.String bindAddress)
        Factory method to instantiate the RPC service.
        参数:
        configuration - The configuration of the mini cluster
        askTimeout - The default RPC timeout for asynchronous "ask" requests.
        remoteEnabled - True, if the RPC service should be reachable from other (remote) RPC services.
        bindAddress - The address to bind the RPC service to. Only relevant when "remoteEnabled" is true.
        返回:
        The instantiated RPC service

      • startResourceManagers

        protected ResourceManagerRunner[] startResourceManagers(Configuration configuration,
                                                        HighAvailabilityServices haServices,
                                                        HeartbeatServices heartbeatServices,

                                                        RpcService[] resourceManagerRpcServices)
